backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining storage, access control, user data maps, activity tracking, ponds, posts, ribbits, and related types and state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two UI changes related to the Header search bar logo and styling with linked files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing component responsibilities and layout/behavior details.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the app with a favicon, meta tags, and mounting point for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and global toaster, defining all main page routes including pond, lily, tag, and profile pages.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component using useBookmarks to display and switch bookmark state with configurable colors.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Renders a comment with avatar, username, timestamp, content, and optional like and reply actions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Emoji reaction bar showing selectable emoji counts with hover animation and selection highlighting.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and caffeine.ai attribution using simple layout and theme styling.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component with navigation, search (desktop and mobile), user avatar, and responsive UI handling including dropdowns and mobile modal search.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main page layout with header, footer, main outlet, and mobile sidebar drawer that closes on route change.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Renders navigation links and recent activity list with active-route highlighting; supports mobile drawer mode.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a post preview with avatar, metadata, image, counts, like/share actions, and navigation links.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Renders images with a blurred backdrop for non-4:3 ratios and a normal frame for 4:3 images, detecting aspect ratio on load.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile slide-in drawer wrapping the LeftSidebar with body scroll locking and scrim overlay.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Sidebar showing pond info, stats, moderators, and join/leave controls, with loading and visibility handling.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: Join button for pond cards that triggers join mutations and handles pending state and toasts.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header for a pond showing banner, profile image, details, and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post with voting, metadata, image, tags, and links to pond and post pages.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user's ribbit with avatar, timestamp, linked post title, and navigation to conversation.
Emoji picker popover for selecting preset emojis.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Shows a threaded ribbit with avatar, likes, reply form, and nested indentation.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Progressively loads an avatar image using a tiny blurred placeholder with smooth transition.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Right sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts with loading states.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Implements a full-screen mobile search modal showing trending searches or suggestions and handling input, selection, and submission.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown beneath a search bar showing trending searches or suggestions based on query state.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar listing top, trending, and newest tags with activity counts and navigation.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers around TabsList and TabsTrigger to create underline-style tab components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs using localStorage with functions to toggle, add, remove, clear, and retrieve bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced value that updates after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a media query matches and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching and mutating ponds, posts, lilies, and related data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers, theme color variables, dark mode overrides, and utility classes for UI elements.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Provides a helper to format large numbers into short forms like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client‑side image validation, GIF detection, resizing, and compression before upload.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes pond names to strict alphanumeric rules and generates error messages.
frontend/src/lib/pondRank.ts: Sorts ponds by lily count, member count, and name, returning deterministic rank assignments.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link via Web Share API with clipboard fallback and toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric-only tags and returns user-friendly errors.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, IDs, Froggy Phrase storage, and settings backup using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Tracks per-lily view cooldowns in localStorage to limit repeated increments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint setting up React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page explaining Ribbit, its features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Lists all ponds with rankings, join controls, and loading states, fetching pond and membership data.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form for creating a lily with text, image, or link, including tag suggestions, image compression, and pond selection.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Allows users to create a pond with name validation, description, froggy phrase, and optional compressed banner/profile images.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Creates a post of type text, image, or link with pond selection, optional tag, and image compression before submit.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile, posts, and comments with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main feed of lilies with search, sorting, and sidebars, fetching posts and showing loading placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Shows a single lily with comments, likes, views, image display, and view-count tracking, allowing posting ribbits and sorting replies.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows pond details including visibility, moderators, and metadata, with loading states and leave-pond functionality.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond’s feed, filtering lilies by pond name, handling membership, and rendering sidebars and mobile headers.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Renders a detailed post view with content, image, link, and threaded comments, allowing users to submit new comments.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists locally bookmarked lilies, loading each individually and allowing removal of unavailable or saved items.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Displays top, trending, and newest tags with stats and loading states using tabs and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Shows posts for a specific tag with sorting, canonical tag redirection, and sidebars.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings for username, avatar, profile, ponds, and admin tag tools with various API integrations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, issues, and requirements for updating the desktop search bar logo.
